    • Method Detail

      • shutdown

        public void shutdown(java.io.PrintWriter out)
              throws ShutdownException
        Attempt to stop the Netty Server. Blocks until the attempt is finished. The attempt will enforce a quiet period where I/O must be silent for some time in order to assure a graceful shutdown.
        Specified by:
        shutdown in interface ShutdownHook
        Parameters:
        out - A PrintWriter to which status information will be output
        Throws:
        ShutdownException - If the shutdown process encountered an exception
